import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../../Styles/login.css'; function LoginPage() { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); const handleSignupClick = () => { setIsLogin(false); }; const handleLoginClick = () => { setIsLogin(true); }; return (
{isLogin ? 'Login Form' : 'Signup Form'}
{isLogin ? (
Forgot password?
Not a member?{' '} { e.preventDefault(); handleSignupClick(); }}> Signup now
) : (
)}
); } export default LoginPage;
